metadata.name: Ancient Revelation
metadata.description:
Uncovered from Antibirth, the original Revelation returns! Complete with mod support for optimal authenticity
[img]https://i.imgur.com/zx4jgfI.png[/img]
[b][h1]----------------------- 𝐀𝐧𝐜𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐑𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 ---------------------[/h1][/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/KfGBixR.png[/img] [i]Remember what came before[/i] [list] [*][b]Item Pools[/b] = [img]https://i.imgur.com/rkmPKKx.png[/img] Angel [img]https://i.imgur.com/rkmPKKx.png[/img] | [img]https://i.imgur.com/nUTDeWr.png[/img] Greed Angel [img]https://i.imgur.com/nUTDeWr.png[/img] [list] [*][img]https://i.imgur.com/pUXwW4e.png[/img] Grants [b]Flight[/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/pUXwW4e.png[/img] [*][img]https://i.imgur.com/vWr0U5u.png[/img] Grants [b]Spectral Tears[/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/vWr0U5u.png[/img] [*][img]https://i.imgur.com/Onomjp2.png[/img] Grants a [b]Brain Worm[/b] effect [img]https://i.imgur.com/Onomjp2.png[/img] [*][img]https://i.imgur.com/rB8kJVd.png[/img] +0.48 [b]Shot Speed[/b] up [img]https://i.imgur.com/rB8kJVd.png[/img] [*][img]https://i.imgur.com/lpsqQiY.png[/img] +1 [b]Tears[/b] up [img]https://i.imgur.com/lpsqQiY.png[/img] [*][img]https://i.imgur.com/iO7Ocex.png[/img] +2 [b]Soul Hearts[/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/iO7Ocex.png[/img] [list] [*][img]https://i.imgur.com/XRwyXZI.png[/img] +2 [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2768970216]Immortal Hearts[/url][/b] instead if installed [img]https://i.imgur.com/XRwyXZI.png[/img] [/list] [/list] [/list]
[b][h1]----------------------- 𝐌𝐨𝐝 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐛𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐲 ----------------------[/h1][/b][list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=836319872]External Item Descriptions[/url] (English [img]https://i.imgur.com/11ORCm6.png[/img] Español [img]https://i.imgur.com/BCCFhHE.png[/img] Pусский [img]https://i.imgur.com/vFcOh4w.png[/img]) [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2376005362]Encyclopedia[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2726016551]Minimap Items[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2768970216]Immortal Hearts[/url] [/list] [img]https://i.imgur.com/9Lz5VfQ.png[/img] [list] [*][u]𝐃𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐨𝐫, 𝐆𝐫𝐚𝐩𝐡𝐢𝐜 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧𝐞𝐫[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198374458982/]Sillst[/url] [*][u]𝐂𝐨𝐝𝐞𝐫[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/kittenchilly]kittenchilly[/url] [*][u]𝐀𝐫𝐭𝐢𝐬t[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/funnynotename]The Demisemihemidemisemiquaver[/url] [*][u]𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐥𝐚𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐬[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/brakedude]BrakeDude[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198813796283]Kotry[/url] [*][u]𝐏𝐥𝐚𝐲𝐭𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐬[/u]= [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/kittenchilly]kittenchilly[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198374458982/]Sillst[/url] [/list]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/3en8OyU.png[/img] [code]Aether, Akad, ALADAR, Andre Doruk, Blind the Bound Demon, Blixy, BrakeDude, cat,,, Firework, fly_6, Goncholito, im_tem, Kars, KitsuneMedia, kittenchilly, Kotry, lambchop_is_ok, Luigi124, Michael¿?, PixelPlz, poody_blue, Sillst, sinbiscuit, Soaring__Sky, The Demisemihemidemisemiquaver[/code]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/SlXbHql.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/xd2eafr.png[/img] [code][u]_Kilburn[/u] - For the original Revelation concept [u]Preyn[/u] - For stylistic inspiration in the image gallery [u]All of you[/u] - For checking us out and supporting us :)[/code]
